ticket.title: number_to_human_size support for negative numbers
ticket.original-body:
When a negative number is passed to number_to_human_size, it always returns the formatted value as a number of bytes. No conversion to higher units happens and pluralization also fails.
The attached patch contains a solution for this issue as well as an update to the test case.
